title: The official list of Good Guys and bad Guys in this game:

replies.body: https://cdn-webimages.wimages.net/051ae2df02d07f9879674947298697fc3fde6e-wm.jpg

{{champion:68}}: "I swear if you don't take Tristana off of that villain list I will destroy your precious city of Demacia!"

http://www.he-manreviewed.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/11/223-18-Fist-Shaking-Tantrum-Gif.gif?Noredirect

https://img.pandawhale.com/post-45209-Lorax-you-have-been-warned-gif-1GuM.gif?Noredirect

Maybe she should have considered that before she refused to follow the Holy Light of Demacia
http://orig08.deviantart.net/8d83/f/2013/357/2/7/5nw4m_by_shnazza-d6z5e6b.gif

(Sees {{champion:37}} )

Ok ok... good

(Sees {{champion:103}} , {{champion:89}} , {{champion:201}} , {{champion:51}} , {{champion:163}}, {{champion:75}}  )

EXCUSE ME? WHAT IS THIS HERESY?

https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTyy_U5PsoxZipJPEhf_xmiOKyNGglwGO_s01KTwlxvbfLMmbqtjg

with all that Light, your Justice is blind sir.
Why is Taric on the Good Guy list? He has been cast out from the Light into the Darkness!

Does this look like a villain to you?
https://66.media.tumblr.com/b349bb41af0381c9585768792c4cee71/tumblr_o56qtsRIge1tvo2c3o1_500.gif
He looks like someone who would leave his command to die while he hit on Ezreal, actually.
So many things wrong with this list. Like most of the yordles being "bad guys" for a start.

Not all of the Yordles are bad guys, just the ones that refuse to follow the Holy and Just Light of Demacia
https://66.media.tumblr.com/2db1e92cbcfc73147409f994b4b3cdcd/tumblr_ny6a4dWIKo1qkjfsyo1_500.gif
You never asked yordles to follow said light! We never got the memo!

Nasus is a bad guy?

I'm sorry, but you have proven you're a VILLIAN.

Does Nasus follow the Holy and Just Light of Demacia? No? Villain.

http://www.gameguyz.com/sites/default/files/pictures_images/14.01.2014/1389669307_3.gif
Nah, he's waiting for Noxus and Demacia to fall, like countless other civilizations he's watched.

So, Demacia indiscriminately destroys every nation that hasn't even shown imperialistic and or immoral conduct? You blame a whole nation for the acts of one, but forgive those unrepentant killers you want to bed?
https://media.giphy.com/media/4sNIjZk8ZYTvO/giphy.gif
I know your game, Laughing Fishy.

It is not indiscriminate. You have to ask yourself: What kind of person would willing reject The Holy Light of Demacia? Noxian scum that's who.

http://www.gameguyz.com/sites/default/files/pictures_images/14.01.2014/1389669307_2.gif
If someone's never heard of the Holy Light of Demacia, then they are branded a villain, fit for destruction?
They would be told about the Holy Light of Demacia first. If they chose to convert to light, they would be spared.

So there is no room for alternate beliefs? You either consume or destroy? Sounds awfully _villainous_.

If Demacia stumbled upon an idyllic village that has never seen war, Demacia would force the village folk into a way of life foreign to them, into a war that is not their own just for your own sake or to deny your enemy? The rhetoric sounds awfully close to a Noxian'sâ€¦

Well that settles it. You are a villain. You have to be purged. 
http://i.imgur.com/W0wVY4c.gif?Noredirect
Even now, you resort to destruction. How heroic. And here I thought heroes preserved the peace, not destroy and remake it.

Vile scourge! I will not listen to your lies!
http://66.media.tumblr.com/8b5936c7e5c6d03732c184ab37429c82/tumblr_inline_ny24ljrVuI1t3o6ro_500.gif

Lies? Lies would insinuate I wished to _deceive_ you, _mislead_ you.

Is a man at fault for liking apple pie when his fellow man prefers blueberry pie? Must they destroy one another, for liking different flavors of the same thing?

Blueberry pie better than Apple pie? That is just unamerican. Communist scum.
http://33.media.tumblr.com/ca2827754757e3dc53d63a6aed5acaab/tumblr_inline_o2acjiFOxM1tyx97n_500.gif

Poor example.

But proceed. Kill me, if you wish. Tell yourself it is for the greater good. Tell yourself that as slay all those that are not your enemies, yet you are so adamant on killing. Just how empty will you leave the world, hero?

My work will be done when the just light of Demacia has purged the world of all villainy. 
https://media.giphy.com/media/l41YAcA355bQvPY40/giphy.gif
And if you had to kill those that once loved you? What if you were the only one left in the universe? Killing is still killing.
https://49.media.tumblr.com/ddf209684f9b9340011558bf61745e1c/tumblr_mottvwmpkx1svkdhqo1_500.gif

Excuse me, but that red head has killed hundreds of people. If you didn't take her to bed she would be just as bad

As for my main, that's fine... I'll just keep backstabing
Nah, don't be so judgmental. Katarina means well.

Read these notes we have gathered on her...

SHE MURDERED YOUR FRIENDS
We all make mistakes sometimes. She is forgiven.
https://media.giphy.com/media/3oEduSAexM9ms4WdR6/giphy.gif

Yeah, me too :^)

Someone please punish us *wink wink*

We request Sona to "punish" us. 

http://a.fod4.com/images/GifGuide/dancing/tumblr_lfa5tmS93q1qdok1go1_500.gif

Request 
http://img15.deviantart.net/b350/i/2016/003/e/d/draven_x_sona_by_furude_imoku-d9lq4st.jpg
Denied.
http://66.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m9wdvgiN281rrk7c1o1_400.gif
http://49.media.tumblr.com/d3bf43bba00e0017e12a9f9ff92a968b/tumblr_mxpklqYYdN1qffiy2o1_r2_250.gif

Malicious, this is an intervention. You need to stop hitting on the people on the boards. It's making me uncomfortable since I don't know whether to be turned on if you're a girl, or creped out if you're a guy, or flattered if you're a gay guy.

Let's just say you can be flattered AND creeped out.
If you catch my drift.
Now I'm actually curious about where you fall
He's ferroussexual.
Indeed.

Here we have clear evidence of how deluded ~~Fish~~ Garen is. The fact that he truly believes that everyone who does not follow "the Holy and Just Light of Demacia" are automatically evil shows incredible shortsightedness.

Heavy evidence of how thick he really is shows up in {{champion:55}} on the good guy list. Not only does she not fit your incredibly short sighted criteria (made it easy to criticize at least), but she's a mass murderer (as is most every other demacian).

If you truly believe that Demacia is the sole vestige of goodness in a giant sea of barbarians and evil (*cough* ancient china *cough historical joke cough*) then declare war on everyone. The "the Holy and Just Light of Demacia" would not steer you wrong and lead you to victory after all.

Unless you harbor doubts. Unless somewhere under your incredibly thick skull you have a doubt that your totalitarian monarchy with incredibly strict class structure, a permanent nobility, and no chance of rising up might not be the greatest place in all of Valoran.

Good and evil are complex things, and cannot simply be defined by the criteria of worshipping one religion and that's all. For example, a good number of people in piltover and some of them in Shurima are good. Not to mention Ionia or freljord. We need to acknowledge people's actual merit, not just their willingness to be oppressed by their government.

*hears whispering in ear* What was that, my main? 

{{champion:421}} Yeah... she's not good.

Be very careful son. That sounds awfully close to something a villain might say...
http://s839.photobucket.com/user/mokus357/media/GarenHavingFunFIXED.gif.html
Out of curiosity how did you make this list?
Very well.
Well played.  Honestly though I feel there should be a neutral category.  Champs like Rammus and Ezreal aren't really bad or good.

Do they follow the Holy and Just light of Demacia? No? Villains.
http://49.media.tumblr.com/aec787e9381945ae72c4546afc64f22c/tumblr_nl225qMjF41qejpvyo1_500.gif
I love how the majority of the people here don't understand Laughing FIsh's love/bias for Demacia.

{{champion:83}} : Forgotten again like everyone does.

_**Alas, poor Yorick! I knew him, Horatio, a fellow of infinite jest, of most excellent fancy. He hath borne me on his back a thousand times, and now, how abhorred in my imagination it is!**_
